game.beginning: After a year of training, Sarah is ready to take back Leningrad. Armed with the latest technology and tactics, she and a group of elite soldiers attempt to capture the crucial city. The fate of the city rests in her hands, but will she rise to the challenge and unite with her comrades to succeed? Time is short and the odds are against her. The city is ready, is she?
game.synopsis: After a year of training, Sarah and her elite team face challenges to recapture Leningrad, where their success is crucial. Will they overcome the odds and join forces for victory?
game.title: Leningrad Reclamation
